mapper.select: select itemcode,itemtitle,itemprice,supplier,itemsize,color,itemdate, NVL(num,0) as stock, goods_cate from item left join (select code, NVL(i-s, 0) as num from (select code, NVL(sum(insertnum),0) as i, NVL(SUM(sellnum),0) as s from insertitem left join sellitem on code = sellcode group by code)) on itemcode = code

select sum(stock) as stock, goods_cate from(select itemcode,itemtitle,itemprice,supplier,itemsize,color,itemdate, NVL(num,0) as stock, goods_cate from item left join (select code, NVL(i-s, 0) as num from (select code, NVL(sum(insertnum),0) as i, NVL(SUM(sellnum),0) as s from insertitem left join sellitem on code = sellcode group by code)) on itemcode = code) group by goods_cate

select TO_CHAR(itemdate,'MM') as stockdate, NVL(sum(stock),0) as stock from (select NVL(num,0) as stock, itemdate from item left join (select code, NVL(i-s, 0) as num from (select code, NVL(sum(insertnum),0) as i, NVL(SUM(sellnum),0) as s from insertitem left join sellitem on code = sellcode group by code)) on itemcode = code) group by TO_CHAR(itemdate,'MM')
